tips.title: Healthy Eating Habits
tips.content: Introduce a variety of fruits and vegetables in your child's diet.

tips.title: Play-Based Learning
tips.content: Encourage your child to learn through play with puzzles and building blocks.

tips.title: Reading Time
tips.content: Spend 20 minutes daily reading with your child to improve language skills.

tips.title: Outdoor Activities
tips.content: Take your child for a walk or play outdoor games to improve physical fitness.
